nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_870_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: His past record is certainly something he is proud of.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_871_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The members of the committee, after a two-hour discussion, finally arrived at a solution.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_872_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: If we want to arrive there in time, we have to travel by day as well as by night.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_873_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I was shocked when I read of his death in a newspaper.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_874_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: According to the police, the young man was arrested at the scene of the robbery.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_875_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: There is nothing more frustrating than spending hours searching for information, only to discover the information useless.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_876_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It is unnecessary to worry a lot. In fact, things will get better in the long run.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_877_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: My smile was meant to show interest in this trip, but Carla was far too intelligent to believe it showed anything of the sort.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_878_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The number of students who want to be enrolled in engineering courses is way up.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_879_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The little girl is so fond of her dog that she gives it a piece of chocolate every day.
